titleStmt.title: The subuersion of Robert Parsons his confused and worthlesse worke, entituled, A treatise of three conuersions of England from paganisme to Christian religion
titleStmt.author: Sutcliffe, Matthew, 1550?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Richard Field] for Iohn Norton,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The subuersion of Rob. Parsons his fancie of three conuersions.
With a final contents leaf; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Title page mutilated; lacks pages 91-92. Pages 80-105 from Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library copy spliced at end.
